courses.title: Roasted Butternut Squash Soup
courses.description: A creamy soup made with roasted butternut squash, onions, garlic and vegetable broth. Served with a side of crusty bread.

courses.title: Pan-Seared Salmon with Lemon Butter Sauce
courses.description: A delicious salmon fillet pan-seared to perfection and served with a tangy lemon butter sauce. Served with a side of roasted vegetables.

courses.title: Wild Mushroom Risotto
courses.description: A creamy risotto made with wild mushrooms, arborio rice, onions and vegetable broth. Topped with shaved parmesan cheese.

courses.title: Grilled Ribeye Steak with Chimichurri Sauce
courses.description: A juicy ribeye steak grilled to perfection and served with a tangy chimichurri sauce. Served with a side of garlic mashed potatoes.

courses.title: Crispy Fried Calamari
courses.description: A crispy fried calamari dish served with a side of marinara sauce and lemon wedges.
